item.title: Dr Thiyanga S. Talagala
item.description: Pre-workshop activities All participants must install R and RStudio before the workshop. These activities will ensure that you have the necessary software installed and ready for the workshop. If you need any assistance with the installation process, please feel free to contact us via email. For those requiring additional help, we will set up an online help desk on Friday, July 12, with assigned times between 5 PM and 6 PM 1.
